summary: A configuration container that holds all hyper‑parameters defining the architecture and training behavior of a SEW‑D speech model, including transformer dimensions, convolutional feature extractor settings, attention mechanisms, dropout rates, data augmentation, and loss options. It inherits from a generic pretrained configuration to enable easy model instantiation and serialization.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to specify, share, and reproduce the exact setup of a SEW‑D speech recognition model for training, fine‑tuning, or inference, thereby simplifying model deployment and experimentation.
